name: Galahad Escape!
description:
Galahad Escape! is an action-adventure game in which we will have to help our character, Galahad, escape from the cave in which he ended up.

During this process we will meet different characters, who can be added to our team, and who will help us overcome the different challenges we meet along the way.

The game can be enjoyed at 98%, I'm currently working on the sound system to add a couple of songs and more sound effects.
